title: How would you increase the number of comments in Facebook groups?
How would you grow the number of Instagram users?
What would be your strategy to bring partners onto the Facebook platform for Black Friday?
If you are in Netflix, what you do to help Netflix grow 10x in India? Why do you feel Netflix has not grown in India.?
How would you increase the basket size of different products for users?
You are a PM of Microsoft Edge. How will you identify the potential areas which can help to increase the market share of Edge?
How would you increase the revenue of Google Maps?
Netflix's subscription renewal rate is declining year over year. What hypotheses would you propose, and how would you validate them?
How would you increase the number of monthly active advertisers on Instagram?
The Netflix marketing team observed that there are many people ordering food when they are watching movies on Netflix. What is the Product Manager's take on this?
How would you ideate, scope and execute a new partnership (partner) for Facebook Marketing Partners Program?
You need to increase Acquisition for a Subscription based SaaS product in virtualization space. What product growth model would be useful?
If you were a senior PM for Google Maps, what would your goal be for the next year?
Increase the number of WhatsApp downloads.
How would you create a localization strategy/roadmap for a product?
How would you grow revenue on Yelp for Business?
You are a Growth Product Manager at Earnest focusing on acquisition, top of the funnel metrics. How would you engage and acquire more students to sign up for student loan at Earnest?

Shopify has launched NFT marketplaces. Assume you are the Growth Manager for this feature/product. Flesh out a detailed GTM/Growth strategy for this launch. Assume your goal is to get to 1000 customers.

Slack recently launched SlackShare, a competitor to Loom. You lead the Growth Charter for Loom and are seeing a steady decline in usage of the core Loom product because of this launch by Slack. Devise a growth strategy that turns around this decline in usage of Loom. Cover: 1. Segmentation, Targeting and Positioning 2. How will you drive adoption? 3. Success criteria and Metrics
How would you improve female participation on a fantasy gaming platform?
How would you increase trust in a new fintech app that allows users to transfer money across countries, for example, from a person in the US (in dollars) to a person in India (in rupees)?
How do you grow the total number of users in mobile app sign-ups, and what strategies would you implement to increase user acquisition?
You are a Product Manager at Apple and have been tasked with doubling the revenue of a specific product within 12 months. What actions do you take?
